short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track and display your browsing history of Twitter posts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension serves as a personal Twitter browsing historian, automatically recording and organizing the posts you've viewed on Twitter. It creates an easily navigable archive of your Twitter browsing activity.

ðŸŒŸEffortless Content Recovery: Never lose track of interesting tweets you've seen but forgot to bookmark or like.
ðŸŒŸTime-Saving: Quickly locate and revisit posts without endless scrolling or searching.
ðŸŒŸBrowsing Insights: Gain a clear overview of your Twitter usage patterns and interests.
ðŸŒŸEnhanced Productivity: Streamline your Twitter experience by easily referencing past content.
ðŸŒŸMemory Aid: Use it as a digital memory tool to recall information from tweets you've read.

By installing this extension, users can significantly enhance their Twitter experience, making it more organized, efficient, and valuable. It's particularly useful for researchers, marketers, news enthusiasts, or anyone who regularly uses Twitter for information gathering and wishes to have a more structured approach to managing the content they encounter.
